column4: Hi everyone, I'm trying to do a fresh install of ubuntu so want to completely whipe my current version off and start fresh. I'm not to sure how I go about acheiving this though. I'm running the live disk now and my hdd looks like this: http://i50.tinypic.com/34hgjh5.png do I just delete  /dev/sda4/  then re-install from disk ?
well, if you want to delete everything, delete everything
Thanks, I read on the internet i needed to unmout swap partions etc.. but I cant seem to find that on my hdd
